title: Observer status for the International Tropical Timber Organization in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/C.6/80/L.4 
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
8 October 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-16081 (E)    141025     
*2516081* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Sixth Committee 
Agenda item 174 
Observer status for the International Tropical Timber 
Organization in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
 
 
Angola, Australia, Austria, Brazil, Canada, Colombia, Ecuador, Finland, 
Germany, Guatemala, Honduras, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, New Zealand, 
Peru and Sweden: draft resolution 
 
 
 
 Observer status for the International Tropical Timber Organization 
in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the 
International Tropical Timber Organization, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the International Tropical Timber Organization to 
participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of 
observer;  
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution.

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the International Tropical Timber Organization to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution.
